channel.title: Need help disableing certain spawned items
channel.description: may some 1 please help me disable certain items such as fire cape and dfs?

item.title: Need help disableing certain spawned items
item.dc:creator: @sordsmen123 sordsmen123
item.description:
@sordsmen123 wrote:

this is what i have and it doesnt work

}if (cmd[0].equals("item")) { if (p.rights <= 1) { if (p.duelFight()) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while dueling."); return; } if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items in the wilderness."); return; } } Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); } else { if (cmd[0].contains("11283" || "6570" || "11696" || "11700" || "11698" || "11694" || "11235" || "4153" )) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn this item, Kill For It!."); }
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2009, 09:57:12 pm[/size][hr]well i got error

Read full topic
item.source: Need help disableing certain spawned items

item.title: Need help disableing certain spawned items
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“sordsmen123, post:5, topic:264731”][quote]}if (cmd[0].equals(“item”)) {
if (p.rights <= 1) {
if (p.duelFight()) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You cannot spawn items while dueling.”);
return;
}
if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You cannot spawn items in the wilderness.”);
return;
}
}
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));
}[/quote][/quote]

Ok, something like this… Creating the beginning of an else if block.

}if (cmd[0].equals("item")) {
             if (p.rights <= 1) {
            if (p.duelFight()) {
               p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while dueling.");
               return;
            }
            if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) {
               p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items in the wilderness.");
               return;
            }
             }
                           Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));
                   } else {
   if (cmd[1].contains("ITEMIDHERE" || "ITEMIDHERE")) {
      p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn this item.");
   }

Replace the ITEMIDHERE with the item id('s) that you want blocked from spawning.

Read full topic
